name: Accelerated Shields
desc: Increases the turn rate of the ship's shields by %s and the rate at which the shields are raised by %s.
short: Increases shield turn rate and extension speed.
sModDesc: Increases the shield's turn rate and raise rate by an additional %s.

name: Central Fabricator
desc: If this ship is deployed when the 'Central Fabricator' is selected, forces this ship to be the Central Fabricator.
short: Sets this ship as the Central Fabricator
sModDesc: When this ship is the Central Fabricator, decrease the cost of swarms by a farther 10%
